that guy sohai 1 lah"There are three kinds of lies: lies, damned lies, and statistics."The sampling method is bullshit.Selangor have been "opposition" stronghold since 2008.As of now, PH holds 29 seats. BN only hold a pathetic 12 seats out of 56 seats. PAS only 13.The result speaks volume.And most of PAS seat was due to the PR coalition pre-2015.Selangor was voting PR just to kick BN.Now that PAS left PR and basically got played like a fool by BN.How many Selangor people would vote PAS?If the Selangor urban malay really wanted an "Islamic" party, PAS would not have such a pathetic number of seats.
U didn't count pas voter at non pas seat?

how to count?the current seat is based on 2013 election, when PR still exist.Under PR, the coalition hardly contest against each other. We don't the true make up of the voter.We don't know if PAS had vs DAP and PKR, the voter would vote who.But it's clear under PR, vote are overwhelmingly against BN.People prefer the Opposition over BNeven if PAS split off, would the voter suddenly prefer BN?
